sources.title: S&P Global Ratings Reaches Settlement With SEC
sources.snippet: NEW YORK, Sept. 3, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- As part of an industry-wide investigation into off-channel communications by the U.S Securities and Exchange Commission ("SEC"), S&P Global Ratings ("SPGR"), a division of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), and certain other nationally recognized statistical rating organizations ("NRSROs"), today reached a settlement to resolve violations of recordkeeping rules.

sources.title: UPDATE: S&P Global merging with IHS Markit in all-stock deal
sources.snippet: Each IHS Markit common share will be exchanged for a fixed ratio of 0.2838 share of S&P Global common stock.
